breadcrumbs.sql: select (select cust_start_dt from cust where cust_id=@cust_parent_id) parent_start_dt

lov.sql: select cust_id code_val,cust_name code_txt from cust order by cust_name

default.sql: select cust_name||' :: Child' from cust where cust_id = @cust_parent_id

fields.name: cust_start_dt
fields.caption: Start Date
fields.default: js:(function(){ var rslt = new Date(); var parent_start_dt = data && data._bcrumbs && data._bcrumbs.parent_start_dt && new Date(data._bcrumbs.parent_start_dt); if(rslt > parent_start_dt) rslt = parent_start_dt; debugger; return rslt; })()
